entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as someone who is famous and has people gawking at him everywhere he goes. He is also mentioned to be in a situation where his neck might get broken.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as having many brothers to compete against at home, which makes it difficult for him to stand out. He is also mentioned to feel overshadowed by Harry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as someone who does not want to tell Ron anything and instead suggests that Harry should talk to him directly.

relationships.description: Harry feels overshadowed by Ron's fame, which is evident from the way people react when they see Harry.
Hermione advises Harry to talk to Ron directly and sort out their issue.
